00200   int getSpan() const { 
00201     if (isindel && insertion == "" )// deletion
00202       return (abs((int)gr1.pos1 - (int)gr2.pos1) - 1);
00203     if (isindel)
00204       return (insertion.length()); // insertion
00205     if (gr1.chr == gr2.chr)
00206       return abs((int)gr1.pos1-(int)gr2.pos1);
00207     else
00208       return -1;
00209   }

00245   // define how to sort these 
00246   bool operator < (const BreakPoint& bp) const { 
00247     return (gr1 < bp.gr1); // || (gr1 == gr2 && nsplit1 > bp.nsplit1)
00248     //(bp.gr1.ref == refID1 && bp.pos1 > pos1) || // low pos is first
00249       //  (bp.refID1 == refID1 && bp.pos1 == pos1 && bp.pos2 == pos2 && nsplit1 > bp.nsplit1) || // if same, check nsplit
00250       // (bp.refID1 == refID1 && bp.pos1 == pos1 && bp.pos2 == pos2 && nsplit1 == bp.nsplit1 && tsplit1 > bp.tsplit1); // if also same, check tsplit
00251   }
00252   friend ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const BreakPoint& bp) { out << bp.toString(); return out; }
